> WarMachine jumps to the side, the missiles passing him by a few
> inches. Roaring he returns fire, his first several shots and one
> missile missing Shokaract as he hits the ground, but the rest heading
> right for the bot.

Shokaract is hit by 2 missiles and 7 shots as he tries to avoid it.

Shokaract: You don''t know when to give up?

Shokaract fires at WarMachine, 3 missiles. Serge fires 4 missiles (One from
each cannon) at WarMachine.
